name: QC Acumen Private Ltd.

Headline: Faster ,Meaner ,Sharper.
ShortDescription: Quotient Consultancy , Established in 2005, is an ISO 9001-2015 certified Global Manpower Sourcing Company.
enhanced_description: QC Acumen Private Ltd., operating as Quotient ConsultancyTM, is a Mumbai-based global talent and human resource consulting company established in 2005. As an ISO 9001-2015 certified global manpower sourcing company, they offer end-to-end HR solutions covering Corporate Staffing, Recruitment, Training, and HR Consulting. Their services encompass staffing, HR consulting, e-learning training, and recruiting automation, catering to diverse industries such as Information Technology, Facilities Management, and Banking and Financial Services. The company aims to be the preferred HR service provider by assuring value delivery, time-bound execution, and continuous innovation.
